name: Blakeyboy Circa 2019
description:
"emotional... nerve wracking... visceral... genius......"

"a true roleplaying experience."

"the quintessential blake experience; cool gameplay, toggleable yeahs, and the best blake james from past and present."

"the spiritual successor to blake goes overdrive"

"i still don't know what kag means"

"a game about trusting yourself, colorful gates, and big booty beats"
